headline: BNY Mellon Tests Tokenized Deposits to Facilitate $2.5T Daily Payments
summary: BK is testing tokenized deposits to modernize its $2.5T daily payments network with faster, real-time blockchain transactions.

raw.headline: BNY Mellon Tests Tokenized Deposits to Facilitate $2.5T Daily Payments
raw.summary: BK is testing tokenized deposits to modernize its $2.5T daily payments network with faster, real-time blockchain transactions.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid BK and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: BNY Mellon has been on fire lately. In the past six months alone, the company’s stock price has rocketed 45.5%, reaching $106.92 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
